name: Risky Run
description:
Objective:

You are Rugen. He always walks backwards,  so you can't see whats behind him. Every few seconds he looks back for a short time. Try to remember and dodge the objects in your way.

 

Controls Walk Left                                                                    A /  Arrow Key Left                                                                   Walk Right                  D / Arrow Key Right                                                                           

The Game still has some bugs I'll fix after the game jam voting phase.  Feedback in comments would be appreciated :)
